name: Fey Lord, Rainforest King
damage_immunities: poison; nonmagic bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing attacks not made with cold iron weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Uses Blooms of Doom then three King’s Spears. Can replace one attack with Spellcasting.

actions.name: King’s Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +12 to hit 5 ft. or range 20/60' one target 8 (1d6+5) piercing damage or 9 (1d8+5) piercing damage when used with two hands to make melee attack + 27 (6d8) poison. If he makes ranged King’s Spear attack weapon flies back to his hand immediately after the attack.

actions.name: Blooms of Doom
actions.desc: Causes poisonous flowering vines to sprout in the space of a creature he can see within 30' of him. Creature: 14 (4d6) piercing damage and become restrained by the vines for 1 min (DC 20 Dex negates piercing and restrained). While restrained creature takes 14 (4d6) poison at start of each of its turns. Target can re-save at end of each of its turns ending restrained condition on itself on a success.

actions.name: Animate Trees (1/Day)
actions.desc: Magically animates two trees he can see within 60' of him. These trees use the stats of a treant except they have Int and Cha scores of 1 can’t speak and have only the Slam action option. They act as allies of the King and obey his spoken commands. Trees remain animate for 8 hrs until King dies or until he takes a bonus action to turn them back into inanimate trees.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: Wis (DC 21) no material components: At will: druidcraft entangle3/day ea: dominate beast plant growth1/day ea: wall of thorns

reactions.name: Leaf Shield
reactions.desc: When he or a friendly creature he can see is hit by an attack he can creature a magical barrier of leaves to disrupt the attack. Target halves attack's damage.

legendary_actions.name: Tree Stride
legendary_actions.desc: Moves up to his speed stepping through at least one tree with his Tree Stride trait. This movement doesn’t provoke opportunity attacks.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
special_abilities.desc: Communicate with Beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

special_abilities.name: Tree Stride
special_abilities.desc: Can use 5 ft. of his movement to step magically into one living tree within his reach and emerge from a second living tree within 500' of first tree appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 ft. of second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

special_abilities.name: Woodland Stride
special_abilities.desc: Difficult terrain of magical or nonmagical plants doesn’t cost him extra move. Can pass through magical or nonmagical plants with o being slowed by them and with o taking damage from them if they have thorns spines or similar.
